# Misc

## Virtual Environments and dependency management

* Python `venv`
* R: `renv.lock` (one has to activate it with `renv::activate()`), [see more in docs](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/articles/renv.html)

## Render docs

Render docs: `bookdown::render_book("docs/", output_dir = ".")`
